description: Second floor level (third storey) to create 3no. x 2 bedroom units
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s) LOWE-PPE01 Rev 1 (proposed - excluding the first floor shown with 3 no 3 bed flats of 74.5 sqm) (Received 29/04/2015)  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing premises   REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies 7.4 & 7.6 of The London Plan (Consolidated 2015)) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), policy 1.1 (g) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2013) | Details of the refuse storage shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the occupation of any part of the development hereby approved, and this condition shall apply notwithstanding any indications as to these matters which have been given in this application.  The refuse storage shall be carried out in accordance with these approved details.  REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupiers of the area, in accordance with policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013, policies 1.1(e) (g) and (j) of the Adopted Ealing Development (Core) Strategy and The London Plan - Consolidated (2015) policy 5.16. | Details of bicycle storage and the parking spaces arrangement/designation   to serve the residential units hereby approved shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before their occupation, and this condition shall apply notwithstanding any indications as to these matters which have been given in this application.    REASON: To ensure that the development provides an appropriate balance of transport options, reduce the likelihood of traffic congestion and does not adversely affect the safety of the road network, in accordance with policy 1.1 (f) of the Adopted Ealing Development (Core) Strategy and The London Plan (2015) policies 6.3, 6.11 and 6.13.
